firstSection.heading: Get a look at our new collections
firstSection.subtitle: Pro Bouw Store -

About.title: About Us
About.section1: We want to introduce you to the excellent quality of construction materials made in Ukraine. Pro Bouw Store is a team of people who truly believe in the power of Ukrainian manufacturing and strive to make it recognizable and in demand in the European market.
About.section2: Our partners are brave Ukrainian entrepreneurs and craftsmen who, using the latest European technologies and their own hard work, create construction materials of the highest quality. We carefully select every product to offer you only trusted goods that meet modern standards of quality, safety, and sustainability.
About.section3: We take on all possible risks related to logistics, supplier verification, and quality control so that you can receive your products quickly, conveniently, and without unnecessary worries. Speed, reliability, and simplicity of delivery are what set us apart.
About.section4: At Pro Bouw Store, we combine European quality, Ukrainian craftsmanship, and the price advantages of products from Asia, creating the perfect balance between cost, quality, and convenience.
About.section5: We aim to become your reliable partner in construction, renovation, and space improvement. Regardless of the project scale — from small repairs to large-scale construction — we’ll help you find the best solutions for every stage.
About.section6: Pro Bouw Store is more than just a building materials store. It’s a community of professionals and clients united by a common goal: to create a high-quality, beautiful, and long-lasting future.

cards.title: Quality
cards.description: European-standard tiles, strict QC, and trusted manufacturers.

cards.title: Logistics
cards.description: Nationwide delivery, pallet-wise shipping, flexible pickup options.

cards.title: Prices
cards.description: Direct-from-supplier terms, volume discounts, transparent quotes.

cards.title: Fast deliveries
cards.description: Many items in stock. Same-week dispatch on most orders.

aboutSection.subtitle: About us
aboutSection.title: The tile store for every room
aboutSection.description: We bring together a wide selection of floor and wall tiles with sharp pricing and fast delivery. In our showrooms you will find realistic room setups, practical advice from specialists, and—thanks to large on-hand stock—the option to take your tiles with you or schedule delivery right away.

contact_page.title: Contact Us
contact_page.subtitle: Have questions about our tiles, delivery, or returns? Feel free to reach out — we are always happy to help.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Probow Store (hereinafter "company" or "we") respects your privacy and is committed to protect it through compliance with this privacy policy (hereinafter "Privacy Policy"). In this Privacy Policy, we will inform you about how we process your personal data. We commit ourselves to be transparent with you by providing clear information about what personal data we process, the purpose of the processing, the retention period of the personal data, the legal basis for processing, and other information required under applicable law.

section1.title: 1. What personal data do we process and why?
section1.subtitle: The categories of personal data that we process about you, the purposes and legal basis for the processing are the following:

publicRelations.title: 1.1 Public relations
publicRelations.legalBasis: Legal basis for the processing: We process personal data based on your consent or our legitimate interest in maintaining public relations.
publicRelations.text1: We process your personal data for the purpose of distributing relevant information to the general public or specific groups. If you would like to receive corporate news from our company, we will collect certain information about you.
publicRelations.text2: We use the collected data to send you corporate news (e.g., press releases), event invitations, and to communicate via email, phone, social media (Messenger, Viber, WhatsApp, etc.) or other channels (e.g., Skype) where necessary.
obtainInfo: You express your wish to receive company news (via email or at events)
You communicate with our Marketing/Public Relations team
We use public sources (e.g., media contact lists)
publicRelations.retentionTitle: Retention: Your data will be stored:
retention: Until you unsubscribe or request deletion
Until we find the contact is no longer valid
publicRelations.disclosureTitle: Disclosure: We may share data with:

agreements.title: 1.2 Agreements with natural persons, including received/issued invoices

naturalPersons.title: 1.2.1 Agreements with natural persons
categories: Date of birth or personal ID number
VAT registration number (if registered as VAT payer)
retention: 7 years from the end of the financial year in which the agreement expired
Or 7 years from the end of the warranty period
Or 1 year after final legal decision (if involved in legal claims)

invoices.title: 1.2.2 Invoices to/from natural persons
categories: VAT registration number (if registered as VAT payer)
retention: 7 years from end of the financial year in which invoice was issued/received

section2.title: 2. To whom do we disclose personal data?
section2.text: We disclose your personal data to:
companies: Group companies offering support, maintenance, or administration
section2.governmentTitle: b) State and local government institutions
government: When necessary to assert or defend legal claims

section3.title: 3. Protection of personal data
section3.text: We apply technical and organizational security measures to protect your data. It is stored on secure systems with limited access only to authorized personnel.

section4.title: 4. Your rights
rights: Right to access: You can request confirmation whether we process your data and get access to it.
Right to rectification: You can request correction of inaccurate data.
Right to erasure: In certain circumstances, you can request deletion of your data. Exceptions apply.
Right to data portability: You can receive or transfer your data in a structured format when based on consent or contract.
Right to restriction: You can ask us to pause processing while storage continues.
Right to object: You may object to processing based on legitimate interest.
Right to object to marketing: You may object to direct marketing.
section4.finalText1: To exercise your rights, submit a written request to us.
section4.finalText2: You may also contact the Estonian Data Protection Authority if you believe we have violated applicable laws.

section5.title: 5. Changes to our privacy policy
section5.text: We keep this Privacy Policy under regular review. This version was created on 16th September, 2025.

returns.title: Returns Policy
returns.p1: If you wish to return any goods to us, they must be returned in a re-saleable condition, in their full original carton/box, and the range must still be for sale on our website.
returns.p2: If you receive damaged or incorrect tiles, you must inform us within 2 working days from delivery. Please provide clear images while the items are still on the pallet. We will endeavour to send replacements or issue a refund where applicable.
returns.p3: There will be a restocking charge of 10% of the value of the returned goods. The customer is responsible for organising the return of the goods to our distribution warehouse within 30 days of the delivery date.
returns.p4: Refunds will be processed within 3–5 working days following receipt of re-saleable items. We recommend placing the tiles back onto the pallet they were delivered on and securing them tightly to avoid movement during transit.
returns.p5: We also advise taking photographs before wrapping and after wrapping, in case damage is caused during the return transit. Due to batching variations, returns can only be accepted within 30 days of delivery. Please note that original delivery costs are non-refundable.
returns.p6: We require clear images of each damaged tile, or images showing multiple damaged tiles. If the provided images do not clearly illustrate the claimed damages, we may request additional evidence or, in some cases, refuse to provide replacements or refunds until adequate information is supplied.
returns.p7: Once the goods arrive at our warehouse, please email us with proof of delivery, including the date, time, and a signature. This will help speed up the processing of your return.
returns.p8: All returned goods will be inspected. Since many of our tiles are sold individually, the refund amount will be calculated based on the condition and quantity of the returned tiles.
returns.p9: Refunds are only processed once the goods have arrived at our warehouse and have undergone full inspection.
